name: Alchemist Slave
description:
LD#37 entry

Game about a alchemist locked in a room and tasked with creating a potion of immortality and a deadly poison.


If you prefer you can use space to toggle grab items instead of having to hold mouse button down to move things.
Pressing A while mousing over a ingredient or potion adds it to the cauldron.
Clicking the drain in bottom left empties the cauldron and dragging a potion over it does the same, pressing E over a item also works.
Pressing B over a bottle is same as dragging a potion over the cauldron.


Goal of the game that I managed to implement is to create a 2 potions, one with over 1000 on heal and magic and less than 5% poison while also having at least 5% in all elements, the other potion requires 70% poison, less than 2% magic and 8% in all elements.
